patterns: What kind of career services does the university offer?
How can I get help with my job search?
What resources are available for career development?
Is there a career fair at the university?
responses: Career Counseling Center (CCC) has a mission to educate and guide the students through collective sessions, placement in appropriate internship sites, arrangement of job fairs, campus recruitments, guidance through seminars / testing / interviews of graduating students and arrangement of industrial visits. CCC has established strong collaboration with industries, chamber of commerce and professional bodies to enhance the professional and industrial acumen of the students by arranging internships, community outreach programs, industrial visits, in-house orientation session and placements for regular jobs.

patterns: What is Full form of KFUEIT
responses: Khwaja Fareed University of Engineering and Information Technology is a public university located in Rahim Yar Khan, Punjab, Pakistan. It was established in 2014 on the initiative of the then Chief Minister of Punjab Mian Muhammad Shahbaz Sharif. It was named after the famous Sufi poet Khwaja Ghulam Fareed.

patterns: how many programms are there in kfueit
how many programs are there in kfueit
responses: The KFUEIT In No for 2023 are given below: 1. Total academic Programs: 100, 2. Total No of Students: 13626, 3. Total No of female Students: 5989, 4. Total no of faculty: 298, 5. No. of PhDs: 90, 6. Land (Acres): 384, 7. No of classrooms & labs: 268, 8. Internet Bandwidth: 366, 9. Total no of Library Books: 180000, 10. No of Engineering Programs: 25, 11. No of CS & IT Programs: 18. You can also check the previous years data on the official website. Here are the link.

patterns: Is admission open in Khawaja Fareed university?
responses: KFUEIT Rahim Yar Khan admission office has announced that admission are open for session 2023. Online Admission applications are invited for Undergraduate Bachelor degree Programs. Higher Secondary School Certificate (HSSC) / DAE in all fields or equivalent with 45% marks. b) KFUEIT recognized/valid aptitude test (KFAT / NAT /KFEAT/ ECAT/ MDCAT). a) Higher Secondary School Certificate (HSSC) with Pre-Engineering / Pre-Medical / A-Levels or equivalent having 50% marks. To check the Eligibility Criteria for admission in KFUEIT, you can visit the link below. Here are the link.

responses: There are two semesters in a year.

patterns: is there any library in kfueit
responses: Library at KFUEIT was initially housed in a renovated hall with an area of about 700 meter square. Today library has 02 full time librarians with 04 persons in attached staff. Library collection has risen to 21,000 books with 7,500 titles. Library services are being offered at 02 premises in CS&IT and Civil engineering buildings. In its immediate plans, KFUEIT Library aims to add 5,000 international and local book titles. Access to digital databases including IET digital library, McGraw Hill collections, Springer Link, Taylor & Francis Journals, Wiley Blackwell etc.is in functional. To get more information about library please! Click here!

responses: Research Center provides a platform for KFUEIT experts to share insights on the issues and approaches challenging the national & international development sector today and the role of research in finding solutions. To get more information about Research Centers please! Click here!

patterns: how many months are there in a semester

responses: The single semester will be around 4 months.

patterns: Do you know about examination rules & regulations ?
responses: The examination cell of KFUEIT is established for handling all matters related to university exams and is responsible for maintaining their quality and standards. The examination department works in compliance with HEC guidelines and KFUEIT undergraduate and examination regulations. All academic results are prepared within this department keeping a high level of secrecy, honesty and integrity. Some of the basic rules & regulations of KFUEIT are given below: Students are not allowed to talk with or copy from other students during the examination. No student is allowed to join the examination 30 minutes after its commencement. No student is allowed to submit the answer sheet and leave the examination room within 30 minutes of commencement of examination.

patterns: when should i come to college
responses: You can message us here anytime. KFUEIT premises is open from 7am-8pm Monday-Saturday!

patterns: will there be any extra curriculum activities?
does the kfueit conducts any fun program
responses:
Yes, Of course. KFUEIT not only provides excellent education but also encourage students to take part in different curriculum activities. The university conducts yearly programs like Sports Gala, Carnival, Holi festival, and Christmas. 
 Also our kfueit has basketball court, badminton court, table tennis, chess, carrom board and many more refreshment zones.

patterns: What are all the different departments?

patterns: What are all the different faculties?

Faculty of Food, Health Science & Technology contains 5 Departments, 5. Faculty of Humanties & Social Sciences contains 3 Departments, 6. Faculty of Information Technology contains 4 Departments, 7. Faculty of Mechanical & Agriculture Engineering contains 2 Departments, 8. Faculty of Natural and Applied Sciences contains 5 Departments. You can explore each faculties by visiting official website. Click here!.

patterns: how far is hostel from university
Does the campus have Hostel facilities?
responses: KFUEIT has arranged a decent, safe and separate hostel facility for boys & girls. Students will have to pay Rs. 15,000/semester for availing this facility, which covers all residence facilities. You can explore more on officoal website. https://kfueit.edu.pk/hostel-department

patterns: How does your university score in major rankings?
How does KFUEIT score in rankings?
How does KFUEIT score in rankings?
What is the rank of kfueit?
What is the ranking of kfueit?
responses: According to the Times Higher Education Impact Ranking 2022, Khwaja Fareed University has secured the first position among the engineering universities of the country and the third position among all the universities in the country in the category of Affordable and Clean Energy. Similarly, in this category, it has been included in the top 101 to 200 best universities in the world. In terms of work on climate change, Khawaja Fareed University has also been ranked first among engineering universities across the country and fourth among all other universities in the Times Higher Education Impact Rankings. Similarly, Khwaja Fareed University is ranked among the 201 to 300 best universities in the world.

responses: From the environment of the campus, to student clubs & Societies, to mental health supports, to athletics, there are many variables that will impact your time on campus..

responses: There are many sports such as cricket, foot-ball, volleyball, netball, basketball, carrom, chess and many more. Our university encourages all-round development of students and hence provides sports facilities in the campus. For more details visit here

responses: There are total 37 Societies for students at KFUEIT at that time. You can explore the list of DSA Societies here

patterns: What are the scholarships provided by KFUEIT?
What are the scholarships related to engineering degrees offered at KFUEIT?
Can students apply for scholarships at KFUEIT?
Is there any scholarships offered by campus?
responses: In order to facilitate the talented, needy, low-income, marginalised or refugee students, the university provides a substantial number of scholarships and financial assistants for their university fee, hostel/accommodation and living allowance so that future leaders do not discontinue their studies because of financial constraints. The major function of the Scholarships Committee is not only to evaluate the Need Based and Merit Scholarships but also to recommend the students for Fareed Scholarship, Pakistan Baitul Mal, Ministry of Religious Affairs, and IEP - SAC (Saudi Arabia) Scholarship. To get more in depth information about Scholarships in KFUEIT, you can visit the official page. Here are the link.
